description: [b]Heisuke[b] is the Eighth Division captain of the Shinsengumi. He is around the same age as Chizuru and is very protective of her, before he died. He leaves the Shinsengumi, following Itou along with Hajime Saitou, but later returns. He too has taken the Water of Life to recover from injuries.
name: Toudou Heisuke
